title: I think someone port blocked my league server via gateway
body:
So I think someone in my family has blocked my league server and im unable to play it says unable to connect to server please check ur internet and my internet is fine.

Please help{{champion:21}}

replies.body:
I'd recommend reaching out to whoever manages your home network so they can [port forward](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8) for League, then.

Let me know if you have any questions.
